full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE BTZUN BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS MDZAD PA'I SHAMBHA LA'I SMON LAM GYI 'GREL PA RIGS LDAN ZHAL BZANG BLTA BA'I SHEL DKAR ME LONG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
